SELECT A.SABUN as sabun , B.EMP_NM as empNm, A.YMD as ymd, F_WTM_GET_ORG_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) AS orgNm, F_WTM_GET_FLEXIBLE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) AS flexibleNm, F_WTM_GET_TIME_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) AS timeNm, A.ENTRY_SDATE as entrySdate, A.ENTRY_STYPE_CD as entryStypeCd, A.ENTRY_EDATE as entryEdate, A.ENTRY_ETYPE_CD as entryEtypeCd, A.CHG_SDATE as chgSdate, A.CHG_EDATE as chgEdate, A.REASON as reason, A.UPDATE_ID as updateId, A.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate FROM WTM_INOUT_CHG_HIS A INNER JOIN WTM_EMP_HIS B ON A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN AND A.YMD BETWEEN B.SYMD AND B.EYMD WHERE A.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD=#{enterCd} AND A.YMD BETWEEN REPLACE(#{sYmd}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{eYmd}, '-', '')
AND (A.SABUN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR B.EMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
mapper.update: INSERT INTO WTM_INOUT_CHG_HIS (TENANT_ID, ENTER_CD, SABUN, YMD, ENTRY_SDATE, ENTRY_STYPE_CD, ENTRY_EDATE, ENTRY_ETYPE_CD, CHG_SDATE, CHG_EDATE, REASON, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID) VALUES (#{tenantId}, #{enterCd}, #{sabun}, #{ymd}, IF(#{entrySdate}= '', NULL, F_WTM_TO_DATE(#{entrySdate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')), #{entryStypeCd}, IF(#{entryEdate}='', NULL, F_WTM_TO_DATE(#{entryEdate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')), #{entryEtypeCd}, F_WTM_TO_DATE(#{chgSdate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), F_WTM_TO_DATE(#{chgEdate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{reason}, now(), #{userId})
